greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest nontrivial power of n starting with n and greater than n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..32
formula: f[n_] := Block[{k = 2, s = ToString[n]}, While[ StringPosition[ ToString[n^k], s, 1] != {{1, Integer_}}, k++ ]; n^k]; Table[ f[n], {n, 2, 10}]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 11 2002
ext: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 14 2002
The 15th term is too large to include.
